data.app_name: Immerse VR App and Platform Demo
data.description:
Transform the experience of enterprise learners by allowing them to access all immersive experiences from any creator in a single, easy-to-use white-label app. This eliminates the need for learners to search across multiple systems and provides them with customizable learning paths that facilitate immersive content access and usage.

With a consistent user interface and navigation, you can create a branded learning experience that will surprise and delight learners. As well as increase engagement with gamification, surveys, and assessment tools. Tailor the learning experience without needing technical skills.

Immerse enables you to streamline immersive learning, measure training efficacy, and prove ROI with advanced analytics. You can centralize all your scattered immersive experiences into one platform to manage all your immersive content, users and data.

You can also create your own training experiences with the Immerse SDK, get bespoke content, or access a wide range of ready-to-use apps in the Immerse Marketplace. 

Experience a new way to deliver immersive learning, download the Immerse demo app now. Contact us to learn more and get access to the Immerse App and Platform: immerse.io.

changelog.change_log: Added a button to allow users to restart the experience
